it.jrc.lt.core.component.sentencesplitter

Class AbstractSentenceSplitter

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.jrc.lt.core.component.Component
      • it.jrc.lt.core.component.sentencesplitter.AbstractSentenceSplitter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Storable

    public abstract class AbstractSentenceSplitter
extends Component
    This is a base abstract class for sentence splitter.

        • sentenceSplitter
        Returns:

      • segment

        public abstract java.util.ArrayList<AbstractSentenceItem> segment(char[] inputText,
                                                                  java.util.ArrayList<AbstractTokenItem> tokens)
        Returns a set of Sentence items for a given input text
        Parameters:
        inputText - character array containing the input text.
        tokens - an array list of token items (@see it.jrc.lt.core.component.tokenizer.AbstractTokenItem)
        Returns:
        an array of sentence items which represent sentence/utterance boundaries.
